messages.message: Hi team, do we have a favorite framework for React?  I have a mini-project coming up and would like to stay consistent.  Catching up on React, it looks like they recommend Next.js, Remix, Gatsby (CMS), or Expo (native apps).  Do we use any of those?
I personally like Next.js the most but not sure what we have been using at Instabase for smaller sites. Maybe @Liam Callanan would know.
Given the `cra-template`/`cra-template-typescript` packages in `javascript-packages` I think we started with create-react-app for the main platform/cloud console/deployment manager
wow, remember c-r-a??? that was such a long time ago
i think cc/dm are now on vite though, and there is an initiative to migrate the platform to vite
Nice, I was just spinning up on Vite.  Should I use copilot to help me :lol:
